text: @GwenGraham @GovRonDeSantis Not a single Floridian should be blamed for the failures resulting with Unemployment System or the COVID-19 data and reporting. FL lacks true leadership. Ours have failed and as a result people will lose homes, starve, and more will get sick. https://t.co/3rwEdnAk8J
